title: ProfessorAvailability
description: An entry from the preference form that states prof's availability for the year

id.description: The unique identifier for the availability entry

prof_id.description: The unique identifier for the prof

year.description: The teaching year the preferences apply to

num_relief.description: number of courses the prof can opt out of this year

num_summer_courses.description: number of courses prof prefers to teach during summer term

num_fall_courses.description: number of courses prof prefers to teach during fall term

num_spring_courses.description: number of courses prof prefers to teach during spring term

why_relief.description: prof provides reason for number of reliefs they put down

preferred_times.description: prof weekly availability for each semester (see preferred_times_schema.json)
